Flow.description: Walks a user through accepting or declining recommendations. No longer used as a better version has been created.
Flow.label: zOLD PROCESS Recommendation - record decisions

recordLookups.name: Get_fees_taken_from_declined_new_products
recordLookups.label: Get fees taken from declined new products

fields.name: AcceptedDisplay
fields.fieldText: You have marked the following recommendations as accepted:

fields.name: nothingAccepted
fields.fieldText: You haven't marked anything as accepted.

fields.name: changedCheck
fields.fieldText: You've changed and accepted the following recommendations:

fields.name: nothinhgChangedText
fields.fieldText: You haven't marked anything as changed.

fields.name: DeclinedScreen
fields.fieldText: You have marked the following recommendations as declined:

fields.name: nothingDeclined
fields.fieldText: You haven't marked anything as declined.

fields.name: unchangedSCreen
fields.fieldText: You have made no changes to the following recommendations:

fields.name: nothingUnchanged
fields.fieldText: All recommendations have had decisions made.

fields.name: changedAmount
fields.fieldText: Amount
fields.helpText: If the client wishes to increase their contribution, this must be verified by the planners. Please leave this recommendation as awaiting decision, and chatter the planner on the recommendation page.

validationRule.errorMessage: If the client wishes to increase their contribution, this must be verified by the planners. Please leave this recommendation as awaiting decision, and chatter the planner on the recommendation page.

fields.name: Expected_tax_relief
fields.fieldText: Expected tax relief

fields.name: changedPhasingFrequency
fields.fieldText: Phasing frequency

fields.name: changedPhasingPeriod
fields.fieldText: Phasing period
fields.helpText: The amount phased each month must be greater than £1,000

validationRule.errorMessage: This phasing plan involves investing less than the Hubwise minimum per month (£1,000). Please decrease the phasing period appropriately.

fields.name: changedPhasingNotes
fields.fieldText: Phasing notes

fields.name: Date_of_decision_changed_lumps
fields.fieldText: Date of decision

fields.name: declinedFeeExplanation
fields.fieldText:
{!Loop_5_6.TakenFromRecommendation__r.PrimaryClientName__c}'s {!Loop_5_6.TakenFromRecommendation__r.ProductName__c} has been declined.


Please choose a new product to take the following fee from:

Fee type: {!Loop_5_6.FeeModel__r.Name}

{!appliesToTextLoop5_6}

fields.name: ChangeExplanationText
fields.fieldText: Please select all of the recommendations which have been conditionally accepted. You'll be able to make changes to the phasing and amount on the following screens.

fields.name: noChangeableRecs
fields.fieldText: There are no recommendations available to change.

fields.name: DeclinedExplanation
fields.fieldText: Please select all of the recommendations below which have been declined

fields.name: nothingToDecline
fields.fieldText: There are no recommendations available to decline.

fields.name: What_date_were_these_declined
fields.fieldText: What date were these declined?

screens.name: Select_new_products_which_have_been_accepted
screens.label: Select new products which have been accepted

fields.name: productAcceptExplanation
fields.fieldText: Please select all of the new products below which have been accepted.

fields.name: noNewProds
fields.fieldText: There are no new products awaiting acceptance.

fields.name: What_date_were_these_accepted_open
fields.fieldText: What date were these accepted?

fields.name: AcceptedExplanation
fields.fieldText: Please select all of the recommendations below which have been accepted unconditionally:
